name: BARK DOG!
description: In BARK DOG! you are a dog, left at home while your owner is at work. You must protect her home while you wait for her,  bad guys lurk outside! Bark at them until they go away! (oh, also, barking is hungry work, so make sure to fuel up when you start feeling snacky! You can't bark on an empty stomach, and will have to pause to eat!) Don't waste barks on innocent bystanders, defend against burglars, and your owner will be home in no time <3
